biography: Hugh Anthony Quarshie (born 22 December 1954) is a Ghanaian-bornBritish actor of stage, television and film. Some of his best-known roles include his appearances in the films Highlander (1986) and Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace (1999), and his long-running role as Ric Griffin in the BBC medical drama Holby City (2001–present).
name: Hugh Quarshie
